name: finland-municipalities
description: Municipality names and codes in Finland
author: Jaakko Holster <holster@iki.fi>

scripts.build: curl -L -o data.csv https://www.avoindata.fi/data/dataset/7307868e-54d0-4f0b-90b0-d0126ad8586d/resource/b1cb9870-191f-4616-9c53-5388b7ca6beb/download/kuntaluettelo-laajat-tiedot-2018-01-01.csv && node convert.js > index.json && echo 'Successfully generated index.json'
